comment.author: 42400804@N05
comment._content: oh yummy pineapples.  my Brisbane grandma had a mango tree and my Brisbane aunty had banana trees (can't imagine there are still banana trees in Tarragindi).  I've never actually seen pineapples growing so thanks for this.
